preloc.hint: This string will be sent through i18n.localize(). Changing these may affect overall automation of Stealthy's effects.

spotHiddenDoors.name: Automatic hidden door detection
spotHiddenDoors.hint: Tokens can spot hidden doors if their perception check beats the door's stealth value

ignoreFriendlyStealth.name: Ignore friendly stealth
ignoreFriendlyStealth.hint: Perception vs Stealth tests will be ignored for tokens of the same disposition

ce.name: Convenient Effects
ce.afterLabel: in CE, using Stealthy's default instead

cub.name: Combat Utility Belt
cub.afterLabel: in CUB, using Stealthy's default instead

ignoreFriendlyUmbralSight.name: Ignore friendly Umbral Sight
ignoreFriendlyUmbralSight.hint: In darkvision mode, ignore the Umbral Sight feature for tokens of the same disposition

tokenLighting.name: Check token lighting conditions
tokenLighting.hint: Check for token effects that indicate lighting condition of the token.

spotPair.name: Record disadvantaged Perception when rolling a check
spotPair.hint: Parse Perception roll results to have both a normal and disadvantaged result, rolling a second die if necessary

dimIsBright.name: Treat Dim as Bright in Darkvision
dimIsBright.hint: Enabling this matches Foundry Darkvision behavior, disabling this matches 5E rules. Install the 'Adequate Vision' module if you wish Foundry visuals to more closely match 5E rules.

spotTake10.name: Perception take-10
spotTake10.hint: If no Spot effect is active, assume the Perception take-10 result for the visibility test. If disabled, Hidden tokens will not be seen without an active Spot effect.
